title: Boo Market
description: Boo Market (BooM) is a omnichain solution for creating ghost liquidity across all chains. One interesting example is bringing memecoins to WorldChain which can be really valuable for users that get WLD monthly, but have no means to expend it.

title: Solvnet
description: A Cross Chain Liquidity Leasing Market for idle funds in Smart Accounts

title: METAINTENTS
description: A module for smart wallets for default cross-chain transactions, utilizing multiple chains simultaneously

title: FlashFi
description: A flash loan enabled multi sig that enables DAO treasury to earn yield

title: ERC20 Unchained
description: Unchaining ERC-20 tokens to enable use across all chains with standard function calls, regardless of where they currently reside. Behind the scenes, LayerZero's OFT handles the balance and movement, transferring tokens wherever needed without any extra steps for the user.
